trait.name: Flickering Flames
entries: The flaritoid can spend its movement to magically
teleport to an unoccupied space. The distance of the teleport is equal to the amount
of movement spent. When the flaritoid enters a space for the first time on a turn
using this feature, it erupts in an explosion of flame that deals [[{@dice 4d4}]] fire damage
and [[{@dice 4d4}]] radiant damage to each enemy creature within 5 feet of it. If the flaritoid
attempts to teleport to a space that is occupied, its movement is wasted, and the effect
fails.

trait.name: Ignition
entries: When the flaritoid hits a target with an attack, it deals an additional 7 ({@dice 2d6})
fire damage and 7 ({@damage 2d6}) radiant damage (included in the attack). Additionally,
targets hit by the flaritoidâ€™s attacks catch fire for 1 minute, taking an additional 3
({@dice 1d6}) fire damage and 3 ({@damage 1d6}) radiant damage at the start of each of its turns. The
fires can be extinguished by an affected target becoming completely immersed in
water.

trait.name: Living Sun
entries: The flaritoid sheds daylight in a 1-mile radius and dim light for an
additional 9 miles.

trait.name: Super Heavy
entries: The flaritoid is made of dense stellar matter, weighing over 100,000
pounds. The flaritoid cannot be pushed, pulled, or forcibly moved against its will
and cannot be magically teleported unless the flaritoid allows it.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The flaritoid makes up to two Collide attacks, each of which must be
against a different target.

action.name: Collide
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d10 + 5}) bludgeoning damage, plus 13 ({@damage 4d6 - 1}) Fire/Radiant damage.

action.name: Solar Flare
entries: The flaritoid emits a burst of magical solar energy in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in the affected area must succeed on a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw or have its concentration broken (if concentrating on a spell or effect), and all spells of 6th level or lower affecting it immediately end.
Summoned by the "Skull" card from the {@item Deck of Many Things}.

reaction.name: Flash
entries: When the flaritoid is hit by an attack, it can use a reaction to emit a blinding
flash of light. Each creature that has line of sight to the flaritoid and is within 1 mile
of it must succeed on a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw or become permanently
{@condition blinded}. Additionally, if the source of the attack fails this saving throw, it takes [[{@dice 6d8}]] radiant damage.
